AutoPaymentText:
You can configure automatic payments for your account. You don't need to make payments yourself, funds will be added automatically. You will have enough funds to pay for services during one month. Payment limits can be configured in the Auto payment configuration form.

Automatic payment may be added in to a list only after a while, only when all required operations are completed
Name: Name
Payment using text: Payment using VISA, MasterCard and American Express bank cards. When ordering a service with auto-renewal enabled, the card will be saved for further payment.
The amount must be greater than: The amount must be greater than
The amount must be less than: The amount must be less than
Auto payment form instruction:
Enter the maximum payment amount per month. We cannot create automatic payments with larger amounts. Recommended maximum payment amount is {{max_pay_amount}} EUR. It is calculated based on expected expenses + 10%. According to existing services and auto-renewal settings, the minimum amount that will be charged from a client's account per month is {{min_amount}} EUR. The maximum amount - {{max_amount}} EUR.

Note: if you haven't specified the maximum, amount the total number and amount of automatic payment per month will be unlimited.
